attributes.action: Karen Morrison to go on day shifts instead of the new person
attributes.additional_details:
Karen has been scandalously denied day shifts despite:

a) it being her turn
b) assurances given at interview stage
c) many other reasons

It is yet another example of abysmally inept management at News International and will finally kill off the morale of the staff after the phone hacking scandal, desk-gate, 6th person-gate and the cancellation of the Christmas party.

Apparently the government and News International have lots of meetings and we're sure they can get something done about this complete fiasco. Perhaps in exchange for the dropping of charges against key NI criminals? Over to you Cammers
